name: ebulliency
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being full of energy and happiness: They have both the courage and the ebulliency to do really creative work. She has a natural ebulliency and there is always a smile on her face. Synonym
ebullienceRelated word
ebullient
More examplesFewer examplesThe communities they built reflected the ebulliency of the people who founded them.The scientists had the ebulliency of people who had discovered something new and exciting.He spoke with the infectious ebulliency of youth.She has an ebulliency of spirit that is immediately attractive.
